channel.title: Talos_Intelligence on Policy to Packets
channel.description: Recent content in Talos_Intelligence on Policy to Packets

item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - SOC114 - Malicious Attachment Detected - Phishing Alert - EventID 45
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step LetsDefend SOC114 alert writeup investigating a malicious email attachment (EventID 45), validating malware in VirusTotal, identifying C2 communication in logs, deleting the phishing email, and initiating endpoint containment from a SOC analyst perspective.

item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - SOC146 - Phishing Mail Detected - Excel 4.0 Macros - EventID 93
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step LetsDefend SOC146 alert writeup investigating a malware detection (EventID 93), analyzing a phishing email with malicious Excel attachment, validating indicators in VirusTotal, confirming C2 communication, and initiating endpoint containment from a SOC analyst perspective.
